As Anthony might say, "bingo!". They may have huddled under a tate, b=
ut 
that is about it. If you were sufficiently rich and there were no 
temp=
les near by, then you would have slept either in your palenquin or 
in a pa=
nelized hut set up for the evening by your servants. Hideyoshi 
is famous f=
or among other things having a golden tea hut dragged all 
over Japan to be=
tter impress the locals with his wealth and neuvo 
culture.
